messages.title: ONLY A MAJORITY GOVERNMENT CAN GET ON WITH THE COUNTRY'S PRIORITIES
messages.content: At the end of this election, we'll either get a Conservative majority... or a hung parliament. A vote for Labour means another hung parliament. SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence vote. With your support, a Conservative majority government can get on with the country's priorities.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Government plans billions for hospital projects
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Better hospitals: Government plans billions for hospital projects. English schools to get three-year £14bn funding boost. Safer streets: End of the soft prison sentence.

Regenerate town centre and get the best from the Government's £25m investment. Help bring high-skilled, better paid jobs to the borough. State-of-the-art CCTV coverage to the town center. Extra £33.9 billion for the NHS. Reduce congestion and emissions, better roads. Deliver Brexit without further delay.

mentions.partyLeader: With Corbyn propped up by parties like the Scottish Nationalists.
mentions.tacticalSituation: At the end of this election, we'll either get a Conservative majority... or a hung parliament.

issues.brexitEurope: I voted to Leave the EU, along with 62% of Newcastle residents. Now it’s time to get Brexit done: I will use my vote in Parliament to deliver Brexit without further delay.
issues.education: English schools to get three-year £14bn funding boost.
issues.government: Government plans billions for hospital projects.
issues.health: My children were born at Royal Stoke: our hospital must have a share of the extra £33.9 billion for the NHS.
issues.labourEmployment: Help bring high-skilled, better paid jobs to the borough.
issues.lawCrime: State-of-the-art CCTV coverage to the town center. End of the soft prison sentence. I will work with the Police to make our town safer.
issues.transport: Reduce congestion and emissions, through public transport and better roads, including a remodelling of J15 of the M6 motorway.

community.content: I will work with local businesses and the council to regenerate our town centre and get the best from the Government's £25m investment.

examples: We'll either get a Conservative majority... or a hung parliament.
That's five long years of gridlock and uncertainty.

English schools to get three-year £14bn funding boost.
Our hospital must have a share of the extra £33.9 billion for the NHS.
With your support, a Conservative majority government can get on with the country's priorities.
I will work with local businesses and the council to regenerate our town centre.
Help bring high-skilled, better paid jobs to the borough.
I voted to Leave the EU, along with 62% of Newcastle residents.
Let's get on with our priorities.

Help bring high-skilled, better paid jobs to the borough.
State-of-the-art CCTV coverage.
Make our town safer.
Reduce congestion and emissions, better roads.
Deliver Brexit without further delay.
Conservative majority government.
£14bn funding boost.
Better hospitals.
End of the soft prison sentence.
£33.9 billion for the NHS.
Deliver Brexit without further delay.

personalStories.story: My children were born at Royal Stoke: our hospital must have a share of the extra £33.9 billion for the NHS.
